org.numenta.nupic.encoders

Class EncoderTuple

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.util.Tuple
      • org.numenta.nupic.encoders.EncoderTuple

  • public class EncoderTuple
extends Tuple
    Subclass of Tuple specialized to hold the 3-value contents of an "encoder tuple". Each EncoderTuple holds a name, encoder and offset in that order. Also, every EncoderTuple's size == 3.
    Author:
    David Ray
    See Also:
    Tuple

    • Constructor Detail

      • EncoderTuple

        public EncoderTuple(java.lang.String name,
            Encoder e,
            int offset)
        Constructs a new EncoderTuple
        Parameters:
        name - the Encoder's name
        e - the Encoder
        offset - the offset within the input (first on bit) that this encoder encodes/decodes. (see ScalarEncoder#getFirstOnBit( org.numenta.nupic.research.Connections, double))
